name: releaseRetentionAddingALine

testSteps.description: Given that im logged into prepayments page

children.description: When i open page from sidebar menu: {Accounts Payable,Voucher Entries,Release Retention}

exception.message: Expected condition failed: waiting for visibility of element located by By.xpath: //div[@class = 'sidebar-menu-container'] (tried for 10 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)

testSteps.description: Then the release retention search page and its contents should show up
When I set the supplier to '133339'
When i clear the business unit
When I set the 'Currency' to 'USD'
When i click on search button
Then release retention search result should show up
When i click on see more details of the first search result
When i select the first line from the first search result
When i click on release button
Then the Payment Information form and its contents should show up
When I set the 'Invoice Number' to 'V0yWbiIr4I'
When i click on continue button
Then the 'Select Bank Account' modal should show up
When I select the checkbox of the first bank account
When I click on 'Submit' button from 'Select Bank Account' modal
Then the 'Payment Amount' form and its contents should show up
When I set the gross amount using retained amount value plus 10
When I click on 'Validate' button
When I click on 'Save' button
Then the 'Additional Lines' form and its contents should show up
When I fill up 'Additional Lines' table form Account Number: '937000', Line Description: 'TEST VOUCHER MATCH', Cost Center: '10', AOE: 'BAM5000', Line Ref: 'A'
When I click on 'Save' button
Then the release retention successfully created modal and its contents should show up
When i click on modal review button
Then the 'Review Voucher' search result should show up
When I select the first voucher entry
When i click on delete button of the first voucher entry
Then the voucher review delete voucher modal should show up
When i click on modal confirm button

title: Release retention adding a line
